afk.title: Standby mode
afk.description:
Switched to standby mode to reduce unnecessary data transmission.
Are you there? It's been more than {{afkTime}} minutes with no action detected!
afk.hint: Hover over this site to reconnect.

fetching.title: Fetching...
fetching.message: The system is synthesizing and retrieving data.

communication.cancelRequest: Operation canceled due to new request.

info.pagingOutRange: Your page number request has no data, showing the first page.

sthWrong.action: Something went wrong. Please try again later!

notFound.title: Page not found!
notFound.description: The page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL. If you think this is an error, please get in touch with us.

validation.password: Password must contain at least 8 characters
